title: Bulk solution energy of a solute (pyiron_workflow)
description: Compute the bulk solution energy of a substitutional solute in a host using arbitrary atomistics engines via pyiron_workflow; demonstrated here with LAMMPS.
steps/codes: Create supercell and substitute solute atom
Run energy calculations for host and solute-containing cells (e.g., LAMMPS)
Extract energies and compute solution energy
publications: Janssen, J., Surendralal, S., Lysogorskiy, Y., Todorova, M., Hickel, T., Drautz, R. and Neugebauer, J., 2019. pyiron: An integrated development environment for computational materials science. Computational Materials Science, 163, pp.24-36.
Plimpton, S., 1995. Fast Parallel Algorithms for Short-Range Molecular Dynamics. Journal of Computational Physics, 117(1), 1-19.
